attributes.action: allow the Chagos Islanders to return to their homeland without delay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chagos Islanders should be allowed to return to their homeland without let or hindrance

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow the Chagos Islanders to return to their homeland without delay."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21080


Prime Minister's Office
